summary: A gang of 4 Danish criminals are ordered by Færingen to steal a bag from a safe. When they see DKK4,000,000 in the bag, they keep it for themselves and head for Spain. They end up in a ruin of an old restaurant on Funen and renovate it.
cast: Søren Pilmark|Ulrich Thomsen|Mads Mikkelsen|Nikolaj Lie Kaas|Sofie Gråbøl|Iben Hjejle|Frits Helmuth|Ole Thestrup|Peter Andersson|Niels Anders Thorn|Henning Jensen|Solbjørg Højfeldt|Jesper Asholt|Helle Dolleris|Bent Mejding|Karen-Lise Mynster|Helle Virkner|Max Hansen|Thomas Bo Larsen|Tomas Villum Jensen|Lars Kaalund|Peter Reichhardt|Morten Gundel|Niciki Jensen|Adam Brix|David Munksgaard|Laura Drasbæk|Lars Nepper-Christensen|Sebastian Jessen|Andreas Andersen|Peter Lambert|Goran Spasojevic|Ove Rud
keywords: cigarette smoking|dark humor|pubic hair|male pubic hair|brief male frontal nudity
title: Luces parpadeantes
